CustomField.description: The economic buyer is the person that owns a budget and, if they choose, can move money around to make a purchase.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: --A score of 0 means we donâ€™t know the economic buyer. --A score of 1 means they know who the economic buyer is, but we don't have a relationship with them. --A score of 2 means they have built a relationship with the economic buyer, can get return fire on a text/email.
CustomField.label: Economic Buyer Score
